body: I really hope there a good ending for this even tho fl is irredeemable she for the most part is being forced so I hope it doesn't go down the same boring predictable ntr routes that he writes

Sorta was rooting for the younger employee, but he's quickly turning into this unnecessarily possessive idiot so any likability he once had is already gone. Just angry fucking the shit out of her, not even caring about what he sticking his dick in at this point.
She is a brain dead slut.

I bet husband is gonna act all protective and shit. He's thinking it's only the new guy who is messing around with his wife. The new guy is a scapegoat so that when the husband has to return to the assignment, the subordinate is gonna go back to banging his wife. All in all, the wife is NOT gonna tattle so she keeps her job, her husband stays financially safe, AND she still gets fucked til she squirts.
we all know nothing will happen
FMC is the main so this won’t do anything. Husband will get lightly suspicious or wary thats it.
the husband will turn into a cuck, like it was with his last work, damn, i really want a NTR that have an impressive ending, but nah, always the same shit over and over.
boring husband will just remain clueless as she continues being a slut
from the husband pov it looks like he's assaulting her and that's how she'll get away with it and this will just be another trash ntr doujin like the rest
Finally the husband arc is approaching
